1.0.name: wordpress/persian-world
1.0.description:
With this plugin you can use and enjoy WordPress in Persian :)

Features:

  • "Translates all the string of the WordPress

    • Included files : -- fa_IR.mo -- admin-fa_IR.mo -- admin-network-fa_IR.mo -- continents-cities-fa_IR.mo

  • "UTF-8 conversion.
